item.title: Under the Hood
item.description: So underneath the simple unassuming design of this blog, this blog is running a myriad of plugins to help it pull off said design.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m hard to describe, I love designing and creating cool artworks, but I also enjoy diving into a bit of coding here and there.
